job-details.address: Saray Mahallesi Site Yolu Sokak No:7 34768 Ümraniye/İstanbul Turkey
job-details.description: Bilişim Vadisi ve İngiltere'de bulunan şirketimize minimum 2 yıl deneyimli Full Stack Developer arıyoruz. ( Remote Çalışma İmkanı ) Şirketimizde geliştirilen SAAS çözümümüzde deneyim kazanmak isteyen, yeni teknolojiler ile SAAS çözümleri Blockchain gibi teknolojiler ile birleştirip, geleceğin teknolojilerinde deneyim kazanmak isteyen adayların başvurularını bekliyoruz.
job-details.niceToHave: Üniversitelerin bilgisayar mühendisliği, yazılım mühendisliği veya ilgili bölümlerinden mezun, .Net Core konusunda tecrübeli ve daha önce proje geliştirmiş (Tercihen ABP Framework kullanmış veya bilgi sahibi) Angular (tercihen), React, Vue veya diğer JS framework'ler herhangi biri ile proje geliştirmiş, Git ile çalışabiliyor olmak. Entity Framework ile uygulama geliştirmiş ve benzer ORM yapıları ile geliştirme yapabilecek, İlişkisel veri tabanı (MS SQL Server, PostgreSQL) tecrübesi olan, REST API, JSON, AJAX, XML gibi konularda deneyimli olmak. Redis, Elastic Search gibi teknolojiler hakkında bilgi sahibi olmak. OOP ve Design Pattern konularında bilgi sahibi, Ekip çalışmasına yatkın, İletişimi kuvvetli, Öğrenmeye, gelişime ve araştırmaya açık, Analitik düşünme yetkinliğine sahip, Araştırmayı ve kendini geliştirmeyi seven, İyi düzeyde İngilizce bilen.
job-details.perks: Remote çalışma imkanı, Ücretsiz eğitimler, Performans primleri

job-details.address: Saray Mahallesi Site Yolu Sokak No:7 34768 Ümraniye/İstanbul Turkey
job-details.description: 3+ years of experience testing full technology stack A programming experience in an object-oriented language (preferably Python) Experience in test automation Experience in writing and executing manual testing plans Experience with Selenium Familiarity with web application development Familiarity with bug tracking tools (preferably JIRA) Understanding of basic QA concepts like quality, verification, and validation Familiarity with Linux/Unix command line interface Experience with distributed version control (preferably Git) Experience in testing cloud applications Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL Fluent in written and spoken English
job-details.niceToHave: Flexibility and freedom are in our DNA! As long as you have a stable internet connection and the drive to thrive, you can travel and work from anywhere you like. A workload you can rely on. We’ll set you enough tasks to keep that mind busy! At Scopic, we’ll ensure you always have a consistent flow of engaging, challenging work to do. Recognition and reward. We acknowledge diligence and hard work through annual pay increases for good performance.
job-details.perks: Salary Range: Negotiable depending on your skills, experience and your performance during our recruiting process. This is an hourly paid position. Employees are paid monthly via wire transfer.

job-details.address: Saray Mahallesi Site Yolu Sokak No:7 34768 Ümraniye/İstanbul Turkey
job-details.description: Are you on the hunt for exciting new challenges that boost your professional growth? If you’re an innovator by nature and a C++/Math/Algorithm developer by trade, we’d love to hear from you! Read on to see if you’d be a good fit for the Scopic team of 250+ professionals from over 40 countries.
job-details.niceToHave: 2+ years working in software development Bachelor's degree or higher C# programming skills are a plus Experience with one or more of the following: QT framework, VTK, Multithreaded programming, Network programming (with Boost Lib), Point cloud processing (with PCL and VTK PointCould Libs), Signal, audio or speech processing/analysis, Image processing/analysis, Video processing/analysis, Machine learning, 2D/3D geometric algorithms.
job-details.perks: Scopic is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, marital status, national origin, gender, veteran status, sexual orientation, age, or disability status.
